attributes.action: make a public statement to let the electorate know what measures he intends to introduce to ensure that elected honourable members suffer the same level of depravation as that being planned for 'families' by the Chancellor.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government continues to announce that repaying all these loans they made is going to cause great hardship in the country for taxpayers.  We taxpayers have a right to know what changes are to be made to remuneration and tax free allowance levels available to elected honourable members so that they get a feel for what is going on and the cost of government is reduced to levels sustainable during the austere period being endured by taxpayers.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
